select alz_teacher_seq.nextval from dual
insert into alz_teacher (id, user_id, nickname, profile, sns_type, sns_id, sns_url) values(#{id}, #{userId}, #{nickname}, #{profile}, #{snsType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snsId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snsUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select alz_lesson_seq.nextval from dual
insert into alz_lesson (id, teacher_id, category_main, category_sub, title, lesson_type, lesson_level, min_student, max_student, open_at, close_at) values (#{id}, #{teacherId}, #{categoryMain}, #{categorySub}, #{title}, #{lessonType}, #{lessonLevel}, #{minStudent}, #{maxStudent}, #{openAt}, #{closeAt})
insert into alz_lesson_schedule (id, lesson_id, lesson_date, start_At, end_At) values (alz_lesson_schedule_seq.nextval, #{timeTableId}, #{lessonDate}, #{startAt}, #{endAt})

insert into alz_lesson_detail (id, lesson_id, detail) values (#{id}, #{lessonId}, #{detail})

insert into alz_curriculum (id, lesson_id, curriculum_order, subject) values (#{subjectId}, #{lessonId}, #{curriculumOrder}, #{subject})

mapper.update: update alz_lesson set title = #{title}, lesson_type = #{lessonType}, lesson_level = #{lessonLevel}, min_student = #{minStudent}, max_student = #{maxStudent}, open_at = #{openAt}, close_at = #{closeAt}, state = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
